text: Federated Wireless offers turnkey private wireless

which is available to our enterprise
customers through AWS marketplace.
The spectrum controller has to

constantly maintain a balance
between reliability and availability.
AWS infrastructure gives us that ability.
At Federated sign up to five-nines availability
for these customers, and five-nines means
Five minutes and 15 seconds annually.

CloudWatch,
which is essential to our services,

enables us to be able to not only monitor
our service,

it also gives us a solid platform
to be able to observe our service.
We can build the framework

and deal with unforeseen failures 
and immediately react to those.
We use CloudWatch logs

to be able
to get insight into the actual workload,

to be able to create traffic models,
to then run our load tools.
We use CloudWatch metrics and we do
auto scaling based on these metrics

dealing with the traffic that,
you know, hits our service.
We use CloudWatch utilization to look at

the various type of metrics
that we collect.
We chosen AWS partnership

for our private wireless deployments,
because it's their ability

to bring the knowledge
on the enterprise requirements,

our ability to provide solution
to the enterprise combination
is a is a golden combination

solving a private wireless network as a
solution for our enterprise customers.
